title: John Borland (Scottish footballer)
text: John Borland (born 25 July 1951) is a Scottish retired amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="inside%20forward">inside forward</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a>. He was capped by Scotland at <a href="Scotland%20national%20amateur%20football%20team">amateur</a> level.
